LanguageData.VAERoy_Swan.label: swan
LanguageData.VAERoy_Swan.description: One of the largest birds capable of flying, swans are often kept by royalty due to the beautiful nests of flowers they build for themselves. These nests have an extremely high beauty, but a swan will never build more than one.\n\n<color=#E5E54C>Gameplay effect:</color> Swans create their own sleeping spots that have extremely high beauty. These nests are auto-asigned to them as sleeping spots on creation.
LanguageData.VAERoy_Swan.tools.0.label: claws
LanguageData.VAERoy_Swan.tools.1.label: beak
LanguageData.VAERoy_Swan.tools.2.label: head
